Question: Ambient Scientific, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ambient Photonics

Product: Indoor Solar Cell Technology

- Innovative low-light, indoor solar cell technology for everyday electronics
- Dye-sensitized solar cells capable of delivering up to 3X more power than other indoor solar solutions
- Built for real-world, low-light applications with revolutionary new molecules and manufacturing processes
- Demonstrates three times better light harvesting efficiency than conventional solutions
- First bifacial solar cell capable of harvesting light energy from the back and front simultaneously
- Allows devices to produce more energy, boosting cell efficiency and enabling more powerful electronics
- Already integrated by leading electronics manufacturers
- Successfully made its first large-scale shipment of indoor low-light cells from its new state-of-the-art manufacturing facility
Summary_cn:
环境光子学

产品：室内太阳能电池技术

- 创新的室内低光太阳能电池技术，适用于日常电子设备
- 使用染料敏化太阳能电池，比其他室内太阳能解决方案提供多达3倍的功率
- 采用革命性的新分子和制造工艺设计，适用于真实世界的低光应用
- 光收集效率相比传统解决方案提高了三倍
- 第一个能够同时从前后收集光能的双面太阳能电池
- 使设备能够产生更多能量，提高太阳能电池效率，实现更强大的电子设备
- 已被领先电子制造商整合使用
- 已成功从全新的先进制造设施进行了首次大规模室内低光电池的发货
